article:
This is a 'list of [[musical artist]]s' whose one hit came out in the '1970s'.

, White Plains, The Pipkins Brotherhood Of Man and The First Class.]] The list
contains recording artists who reached the Top 40 of the U.S. pop chart (the
''Billboard'' Hot 100) with just one single.

Artists in italics have only one Top 40 hit, but either *had other songs chart
on genre-specific charts *have had success and influence within their genre or
the annals of popular music and/or **a long-lasting and devoted cult following
**wider success in other fields of the music industry *are a non-American act
who have had wider success in their homeland
